suggestions.original: To improve the artwork's organization, consider repositioning the question mark to a more central or relevant location within the scene to enhance the narrative flow. Additionally, the placement of the balloons could be adjusted to avoid overlapping with other elements, ensuring they do not distract from the main action. This will help maintain a clear and engaging composition throughout the four scenes.
